name: Pete's Guitar
text:
"Ashcan" Pete deck only. Replacement.
[fast] Exhaust Pete's Guitar: Choose a non-[[Elite]] enemy at your location or a connecting location. Move that enemy once in a direction of your choice. Then, if there are no enemies at your location, either heal 1 horror or gain 1 resource.
real_text:
"Ashcan" Pete deck only. Replacement.
[fast] Exhaust Pete's Guitar: Choose a non-[[Elite]] enemy at your location or a connecting location. Move that enemy once in a direction of your choice. Then, if there are no enemies at your location, either heal 1 horror or gain 1 resource.

name: Hard Times
text: "Ashcan" Pete deck only. Replacement. Revelation - Put Hard Times into play in your threat area. Forced - After you draw 1 or more cards: Choose and discard that many cards from hand. [action][action]: Discard Hard Times.
real_text: "Ashcan" Pete deck only. Replacement. Revelation - Put Hard Times into play in your threat area. Forced - After you draw 1 or more cards: Choose and discard that many cards from hand. [action][action]: Discard Hard Times.
